metaData.title: Discover Rosia Montana. Trails, attractions, activities
metaData.description: Trails on areas (from historic center and roman galleries up to the top of the mountains). Thematic trails (mining evolution, the protests, rural life). You can also book guided tours, rooms, bikes, camping in Rosia Montana, Alba, Apuseni Mountains, Transylvania, Romania.

specificArticles.textContent:
We are located in Roșia Montana, Carpathian Mountains, Transylvania, an area with fantastic landscapes due to the mountains, valleys and the lakes around us, but also with a rich culture and history because of the heritage buildings and because it has one of the largest and important underground gold mining complex from the world, built by various civilizations who came here to extract gold. Discover our area through the following hiking or biking trails. Each trail has images, description and online maps with GPS data (can be access from any device during the trail). The shown distance represents the whole length of the trail from and to Casa Petri.
The icons from each trail means: - hiking trail | - biking trail | - the destination can be also reach by car
